summary: REQ-15 appears partially addressed by modifying backend/main.mo to remove the trap-only deployment behavior, but the diff summary is too truncated to verify all acceptance criteria. REQ-16 is not implemented: no static asset files were added under frontend/public, despite references to /assets/generated/ngfc-favicon.dim_64x64.png and required generated logo assets.

missing_requirements.requirement: Ensure the production frontend loads without missing critical static assets by adding the uploaded logo image as the canonical generated logo file(s) used by the UI and confirming all referenced `/assets/generated/*` and `/assets/gallery/*` paths used in `frontend/src/App.tsx` resolve at runtime.
missing_requirements.reason: No files were added, and the diff does not show any new assets under `frontend/public` (where `/assets/...` must exist). The change to `frontend/index.html` references `/assets/generated/ngfc-favicon.dim_64x64.png`, but the corresponding image file is not added in this diff summary.

hallucinated_features.description: Removed the “Downloads/Brand Assets” section and its navigation link from the marketing site.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest is limited to deployability and ensuring required static assets exist; removing a site section is not requested as part of REQ-15 or REQ-16.
